item.description:
We are located to the right of the tennis courts on the hill. Look for the meetup signs

Did you enjoy the Memorial Day Cookout at Salem Willows?...Let's do it again.

Did you miss the Memorial Day Cookout at Salem Willows?....Come join us.

We are going to work this the same way, everyone will need to bring a food contribution to share with everyone.  The Organizers will be bringing the Hamburger, Hot dogs, Rolls & Paper Products/Utensils, we need everyone else to bring the other Cookout necessities.  Below is the list of some suggested contributions, please include in your RSVP what you will be contributing.

 

A Case of Water

Pickles & Chips

Potato Salad

Pasta Salad

Tossed Salad

Desserts

Mustard, Ketsup, Relish

Other (please specify)

For those who have never been to the willows, there is metered parking around the arcades, these have a 2 hour limit 7 days a week.  There is also parking down by the tennis courts that is free and has no limit. 

If you get lost, are running late or can't find us, please call the Meetup cell phone at 978-304-2811.

 

Hope to see you all at the Willows

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Picnic area with the Meetup sign
item.name: Cookout at Salem Willows
